messages.body:
June 23, 2006

Mr. Kings,

I am Lewis D. Noogie and I am a hotel consultant, currently consulting to the Nye Zalupaisya hotel here in Gadyukina, Russia. It was I who received your reservation request and I will go ahead and process it for you. We can offer you the following rates for the period 01 Oct 06 - 15 Oct 06:

Single - RuR 6,160 (approx. US$220) / night 
Double - RuR 8,400 (approx. US$300) / night 
Jr. Suite - RuR 10,500 (approx. US$375) / night 
Executive Suite - Rur 12,600 (approx. US$450) / night

All room rates include VAT and breakfast with complimentary morning vodka.

Per your request for 5 Ea, Double rooms for 14 nights, total charges for lodging is RuR 588,000 or approximately US$21,000. This of course is exclusive of other meals, laundry, or other hotel services. Payment is acceptable in either Russian Rubles or US Dollars.

We offer a tranquil mountain setting with ample opportunity for hikes in the mountains, rock climbing, and water sports, and tours of the armaments factories in Irkutsk can be arranged with 2-days notice. We have an outstanding restaurant serving both Russian and Cajun cuisine, a comfortable lounge and Olga, our full-time East German massage therapist is here to massage away those muscle aches and sprains for those of you who try the rock climbing..

Please advise if you want to secure reservations at your earliest convenience. Also please advise your flight schedule and whether or not you will require pickup from the Irkutsk airport.

Sincerely, 
Nye Zalupaisya Hotel and Resort 
7, Otyebis Prospect, Gadyukina, 
Irkutskskaya Oblast, Russian Federation. 300107 
Tel: 7-495-964-8597

Mr. Fancourt,

I would like to ask your indulgence in slightly delaying the forwarding of US$ 4, 070 to your travel agent. I would like to use the money (temporarily, of course) to take Olga, the East German massage therapist here at the hotel, for a weekend in Irkutsk. You know, nice hotel, good restaurants, that sort of thing. She's a beautiful girl, an Anna Kornikova look-alike, except about 6 inches shorter and 250 pounds heavier. Speaking man to man, I've been putting the moves on her since I started consulting to this hotel but I haven't even gotten to first base. She wants a weekend in Irkutsk but my cash flow situation hasn't been that good lately and I would consider it a tremendous favor from one guy to another if I could use your money for the trip. Not to worry, though, I can have the money to your travel agent in plenty of time for your trip here in October.

Would you have any problem with this?

By the way, will your party require pickup at Irkutsk International Airport?

Sincerely, 
Lewis D. Noogie

Favour (I hope you don't mind me using your first name),

Dude, I probably didn't explain my situation well enough. This massage therapist is HOT, and she's shot me down every time I try to hit on her. It's only because I said I'd take her to Irkustsk that I've got any chance at all here.

Here's what I'll do to sort of throw a little interest on the loan. Olga's younger sister Oxnard also works here at the hotel. She's a bit stockier than Olga but she's big-boned so she carries it well. And talk about a party-girl! I'll fix you up with her for your entire stay here at the hotel. As long as you don't have any kind of heart condition I guarantee you won't have a dull moment!

What d'you say? Will you take one for the team here?

As far as how much money your delegates should bring, tell them to bring plenty! This is a party town! And don't forget to let me know if you will require transportation to Gadyukina from Irkutsk International Airport.

By the way, my friends call me Lewd (short for Lewis D.)

Lewd

Mr, Kings,

I thank you for your generous offer to finance the siege of Olga, the East German massage therapist; I knew you were church people!

We do apparently have a bit of a problem though.You see, I've been contacted by the Visa credit card people and apparently there's some question as to the ownership of the credit card bearing the number you quoted me. They asked me to send the card number and the account information where you wanted me to send the money to them and to New Scotland Yard, something about credit card fraud. I'm sure they're making a mistake but we don't want to get sideways with those guys, do we?

They said they would get back to me as soon as possible with the results of their investigation. I'll let you know as soon as they do and then I can forward your money to your travel agent. Just hang tight for a little while.

Will your party need rides from Irkutsk International Airport?

Lewd

Single - RuR 6,160 (approx. US$220) / night; Your rate - RuR 5,000 (approx. US$180) / night 
Double - RuR 8,400 (approx. US$300) / night; Your rate - RuR 7,000 (approx. US$254) / night

messages.body:
August 22, 2006

Hi, Mr. Kings,

I just wanted to let you know that I checked the long-range weather forecast for the period of time that you will be here and the outlook is very nice. It should be pleasantly warm but be sure you bring a sweater or a light jacket for the evenings.

I really think you will enjoy it here. I like to go out for walks in the hills in the evenings and just enjoy the quiet. It's a good thing I enjoy nature because for a girl of 27 years old there's not much else to do. There aren't many men my age here and it's been very nice corresponding with a gentleman like yourself.

Can I ask, do you live in the UK or are you only there on business? I've never been there, how do you like it there? Do you mind if I ask if you are married?

Well, everything will be ready for you and your delegates when you arrive and I look forward to meeting you in person.

Yours truly, 
Maya

Favour, my old friend, you are a saviour! You have come to my rescue again! I don't know what I'd do without you!

Hard as it may be for you to believe, I still have not gotten very far with Olga, the East German massage therapist who works there at the hotel. She keeps me at arm's length there in Gadyukina and the only place she seem's to loosen up a bit is here in Irkutsk. She has expensive tastes but there's noplace fancy enough to take her in Gadyukina. Well, when Maya, my administrative assistant called and said that you had allowed her to charge your credit card for $10,400, I realized I could now afford another holiday with her here. I called Olga and told her to join me here in Irkutsk. She'll be arriving sometime tomorrow evening.

I knew you wouldn't mind me using your money again, us being as tight as we are. I'll try to keep what I spend reasonable as I can, but you know what this girl is like. And don't worry, I'll try to get the money to your travel agent sometime before October. I realize I owe you a big one from the last time you helped me out and I'm gonna take care of you and your posse when you arrive at the hotel.

You da man, dog!

Lewd
